name: Ninh Binh - Hoa Lu - Tam Coc Photo Explorer
description: Discover classic lowland northern Vietnam on this one day photo adventure to Ninh Binh province.  Our trip includes a two-hour boat journey at Tam Coc Nature Reserve, or ‘Ha Long Bay on land’, a photographic exploration of the ruins at Vietnam’s ancient capital of Hoa Lu, and a sunset wander through the stunning paddies and river valleys of this beautiful region.  Learn the art of great travel photography while exploring one of northern Vietnam’s most scenic and culturally-rich provinces.
